name: Fast Food Simulator
description:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1355970/Jungle_House/
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1366840/Moon_Farming/

Fast Food Simulator is a restaurant and cooking game where you can cook and serve various fast food. Build, bake and serve yummy fast food as a chef in this amazing restaurant game that puts you in charge of your very own business.

Your restaurant becomes successful when your customers are fully satisfied. The more you will play more items will appear to make delicious burger and sandwiches.

- Prepare and Serve delicious burger and sandwiches.
- Improve your serving skill and time management.
- More than 45 fast food levels to explore.
